description.value:
Clerics of the Order Dominion learn the following spells when able to cast Cleric spells of the same spell level.  These spells are always prepared and don’t count against your prepared spell amount.  

Dominion spells are considered Cleric spells when learned this way.  

 

Order Dominion Spells

Able to Cast

Spells

1st Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.MRQUPL1D078DKFR2]{No Reproach}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.3XZ089KFBQMQUFK5]{Tunnel Vision}

2nd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.RSOH8YFIDRSE3ZCL]{Repress Emotions}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.YCQC074MGCT6R2NY]{Ultimatum}

3rd Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.XD6W9NSEKZ48HGCD]{Dispel Magic}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-3.Z373UKDNQ9VFAMQD]{Syzygy}

4th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.XJ75LFYCND9DK4GP]{Banish}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-4.7H0M1UB9Z1ZVHSJ0]{Remove Arms}

5th Level Cleric Spells

@Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.N2ZSVB7D1W068EWZ]{Ashame}, @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-5.J9QLMOBH6NXLN5OQ]{Telepathic Network}
